FuncDef: The display ipv6 fib slot command displays Forwarding Information Base (FIB) entries on a specified board. The display ipv6 fib slot command displays Forwarding Information Base (FIB) entries on a specified board. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display ipv6 fib slot <slotid> all-vpn-instance [ statistics | verbose ]
display ipv6 fib slot <slotid> [ vpn-instance <vpn-name> ] [ <destip> [ <destipmasklen> ] ] [ verbose ]
display ipv6 fib slot <slotid> [ vpn-instance <vpn-name> ] statistics

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 23  case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Displays information about FIB entries of all VPNs.
-

Displays detailed information about FIB entries.
-

Displays FIB entries of the VPN instance with a specified name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, which do not contain spaces.

Specifies the prefix of an IPv6 address.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Specifies the prefix length of an IPv6 address.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 128.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display ipv6 fib slot 1 fc00:0:0:2001:: verbose
